bibl.title: Papyri from the Washington University Collection, St. Louis, Missouri. Part II (P. Wash. Univ. II). (Papyrologica Coloniensia. XVIII.)
bibl.note: P. Wash. Univ. II, 62-108: Literary and subliterary texts (62-75); - Official documents (76-89); - Private documents (90-105); - Letters (106-108); - Addenda and Corrigenda to Part I.
